lead_paragraph: The Big Ten Conference fined Illinois and Ohio State $10,000 each and reprimanded their head coaches for a shoving match involving players after last Saturday’s game. Players from both teams shoved one another and at least a couple threw punches as they met at midfield of Ohio Stadium after the 28-21 Illini victory.
